entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
